mosinstall.name: Image Fade Slideshow :: DHTML
mosinstall.author: rabencor
mosinstall.description: This module will display a random serie of images, fade slideshow (fade effect only in IE). Based on a DynamicDrive script.

param.name: img1
param.label: Image 01
param.description: Image 01, add file name with extension.

param.name: link1
param.label: Image URL 01
param.description: URL where the image 01 goes... ( format: www.thesite.com)

param.label: Image 02

param.label: Image URL 02

param.label: Image Width

param.name: frameimg
param.label: Display a bordered frame around images?
param.description: Select yes to display a frame around the images

param.name: frameborder
param.label: Frame Border Width
param.description: Frame border's width, set to 0 for none

param.name: framebcolor
param.label: Frame Border Color
param.description: Frame border's color, in HEX format: #000000

param.name: ss_speed
param.label: Slide Show Speed (miliseconds)
param.description: Controls the speed of the slide show

param.name: link_open
param.label: Open links in a new window?
param.description: Select yes if you want image links to open in new window
